SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.scanners

Class RspamdClient

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.scanners.RspamdClient
public class RspamdClient extends Object
Rspamd antispam scanner client.

This class provides functionality to scan emails for spam and phishing using the Rspamd service through HTTP/REST API.

  • Constructor Details

    • RspamdClient

      public RspamdClient()
      Constructor with default host and port.

      Uses localhost:11333 which is the default for Rspamd daemon.

    • RspamdClient

      public RspamdClient(String host, int port)
      Constructor with specific host and port.
      Parameters:
      host - The Rspamd server host.
      port - The Rspamd server port.

      Returns:
      True if spam is detected, false otherwise.

    • getScore

      public double getScore()
      Get the spam score from the last scan result.
      Returns:
      The spam score or 0.0 if no scan has been performed.

    • getSymbols

      public Map<String,Object> getSymbols()
      Get the detected symbols (rules that matched) from the last scan.
      Returns:
      Map of symbol names to their scores, or empty map if no scan performed.

    • getLastScanResult

    • setDkimSigningOptions

      public RspamdClient setDkimSigningOptions(String domain, String selector)
      Set whether DKIM signing is enabled and configure signing options.

      IMPORTANT: This method configures which domain and selector to use for DKIM signing. The actual private key must be pre-configured in Rspamd's DKIM keystore. Rspamd looks up the private key using the domain/selector combination provided here.

      Rspamd DKIM key configuration: - Keys are typically stored in /etc/rspamd/dkim/ directory - Private keys should be in PEM format: /etc/rspamd/dkim/{domain}.{selector}.key - Public keys are published in DNS at: {selector}._domainkey.{domain} - Configure key paths in Rspamd's dkim_signing module configuration

      Parameters:
      domain - The domain to sign for (e.g., "example.com"). Must match a configured domain in Rspamd.
      selector - The DKIM selector (e.g., "default"). Must match a configured selector in Rspamd.
      Returns:
      Self.
